alert.note: Alert for Brevard; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 10:15AM EST until March 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seminole County in east central Florida... Northwestern Brevard County in east central Florida... Orange County in east central Florida... Southeastern Volusia County in east central Florida... Northwestern Osceola County in east central Florida... * Until 1100 AM EST. * At 1015 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bethune Beach to Maytown to near Champions Gate, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Sanford, Titusville and Apopka. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for east central Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for east central Florida.
